page_content: Discusses rental income from various types of land and net income from forest management.
Reports a police intervention in Finsterhennen due to property damage.
Provides information on the requirements and procedures for obtaining a residence permit in Switzerland.
Discusses different types of extraordinary income in accounting, such as income from the sale of business properties.
Discusses the tax implications of owning at least 10% of the capital of a corporation or cooperative.
Discusses the findings of a legal report on construction defects at the Women's Clinic of the Inselspital.
Announces a fire ban in the forest and nearby areas due to high risk of forest fires.
